description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You use to be safe atop your precious little trees, but now you have been knocked down and must use the resources of the jungle to fend off your fiendish brain eating foes.  Beware for other tribes have fallen to this disease and some have unexpected qualities.  You can brave this journey alone or recruit some of your old friends, the choice is yours, hurry you must defend the temple.
